cgcloud__Promotion_Template_Tactic_Templ.name: cgcloud__Promotion_Template_Tactic_Template__c
cgcloud__Promotion_Template_Tactic_Templ.description: Junction Object between Promotion Templates and Tactic Templates.

cgcloud__Is_Transfer_Relevant__c.description: Identifies if the tactic template is eligible for transfer.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the Promotion Template Tactic Template.

cgcloud__Sort__c.description: Determines the display order of the tactic template while adding a tactic to a promotion. By default, ‌tactic templates are shown in ascending order. Make sure that you enter a value that’s unique within the promotion template.
